desc.p: Fields SC.POS.ASSET to COLLATERAL form a related multi value set. Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
A maximum of 22 characters may be entered.
Must be the key to a valid entry on the COLLATERAL file.
Fields SC.POS.ASSET to COLLATERAL form a related multi value set. Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
A maximum of 20 characters may be entered.
A maximum of 18 characters may be entered.
Must be the key to a valid entry on the SEC.ACC.MASTER file.
